physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white portrait photograph. It features a man, dressed in a turban, a white long-sleeved top and trousers, a wrap cloth around his waist, and a sash across his chest. The photograph is quite faded and stained. There are no inscriptions, tears, or folds seen.
sgcool_label_text: "This is part of a series of small carte de visite format portrait photographs by August Sachtler, a German photographer who started photographing in Singapore in the early 1860s. The studio details inscribed on the back of these cartes de visite read ""A. Sachtler in Singapore""
title_text: Series of six carte de visite portraits by August Sachtler Photograph of Indian sepoy
subject_terms_1: indigenous people ways of life folk costume soldiers portraits
subject_terms_2: Carte de visite photographs Portrait photography Indigenous people Lifestyles Ethnic costume Soldiers
